extractFactDictList.question: Who wrote the musical?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The musical was written by Andrew Lloyd Webber, with lyrics by Glenn Slater, and was first performed on Broadway in The musical premiered at the Winter Garden Theatre on December 6, 2015, with previews beginning on November 9, It was directed by Laurence Connor and featured a cast that included Jack Black, who reprised his role from the film, as well as Alex Brightman, who played the role of Dewey Finn.
